summary: Single-page "Hug Day" HTML/CSS/JS romantic greeting page featuring a hero hug emoji, message card with photo, and continuous floating emoji/hearts animation with burst on load and click.
architectural_notes: Static HTML/CSS/JS page with fixed-position floating emoji elements animated upward; burst on page load and on body click; elements removed on animation end.

Ensure floating emoji/hearts layer renders above page content via z-index/stacking context (e.g., fixed overlay container with pointer-events disabled) while content layout (photo position) remains unchanged.
